**Centaur [bardings](/Barding "Barding")** are a type of armor intended for [centaurs](/Centaur "Centaur") to wear in place of [boots](/Boots "Boots"), which do not fit on their horse-shaped lower halves. Although significantly less common than boots, they provide double the AC and can be enchanted twice as heavily. In exchange, they do have a slight [encumbrance rating](/Encumbrance_rating "Encumbrance rating"), but this has no effect on your spellcasting, [stealth](/Stealth "Stealth"), or accuracy. The only negative impact is a loss of 2 points to your [evasion](/Ev "Ev"), which can not be reduced by a high armor skill.

Possible egos include:

- [Fire resistance](/Fire_resistance "Fire resistance")
- [Cold resistance](/Cold_resistance "Cold resistance")
- [Flying](/Flying "Flying")
- [Stealth](/Stealth "Stealth")

AC from centaur barding is not penalized by a centaur's [oddly-shaped body](/Bad_mutations#Deformed_Body "Bad mutations"). Non-centaurs cannot wear centaur barding, though [nagas](/Naga "Naga") have [naga barding](/Naga_barding "Naga barding"), a type of barding intended for them.

## History

- In [0.26](/0.26 "0.26"), [centaur bardings]() and [naga bardings](/Naga_barding "Naga barding") were merged into a single item type called [bardings](/Barding "Barding").
- In [0.12](/0.12 "0.12"), bardings of levitation were replaced with bardings of flying.
